name: DeepDark Nyaa.si
description: This is my version of dark theme for nyaa.si and it's subdomains. Before turning on theme change default theme to light because I turned off changing default themes as there are little differences (I think) generated dynamically which I can't point. Other than that 99% of light and dark default themes looks the same with this theme.

user.name: kostek00
user.about: If you see something missing or incorrect on page that I wrote style for write me mail with title "[Stylish] style name here". I will try to fix it as soon as I read your mail.

additional_info:
v 1.0.0: First release.
v 1.0.1: Darker alert box.
v 1.0.2: Added style to comment icon.
v 1.0.3: Minor changes and added few missing bits.
v 1.0.4: Added blockquote and code.
v 1.0.5: Added color for confirmation message.
v 1.0.6: Added pre.
v 1.0.7: Changed buttons and textfield for comments. Changed border color for targeted comments.

discussions.name: Consider styling the recaptcha UI shown for registered users
